title: About - jvitoralb Portfolio
aboutMe1: I am a web developer with over three years of experience. My projects range from landing pages and institutional websites to more complex web applications. I specialize in developing websites with user-friendly interfaces and responsive design using different technologies.
listTitle: Throughout my career, I have developed solid knowledge in:
item1: WordPress Development: Creating websites using WordPress, including custom themes and plugins, performance optimization, and SEO.
item2: Front-end: Building responsive and modern interfaces with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Bootstrap.
item3: Back-end: Developing RESTful APIs using Node.js and Java with SQL and NoSQL database integration.
item4: Best Practices and Architecture: Applying knowledge in software architecture and quality assurance to ensure project quality, scalability, and maintainability.
